full_text: 5. We hear a lot about the troubles the #Ebola response is facing — case contacts refusing vaccine or fleeing & spreading Ebola to a new location. But this week's Situation Report has some nice news: +90% of people offered vaccine agree to be vaccinated. Little miracle, that. https://t.co/BXPXe7v6aG

full_text: 2. The number of health workers infected in this #Ebola outbreak has risen again. It now stands at 74 infections, 26 deaths. This from this week's Situation Report from @WHOAFRO.
